text: He left reading the story at the point where a character had left reading the story at the place where a character had left reading and was coming to his home where someone who had been waiting for him had put a story on the table to kill time and came to the place where a character had left reading and was coming to the home where someone who had been waiting for him had put a story on the table to kill time. FIN Papers Unexpected, 2009
title: Secuencias
author: Julio Cortázar
